languages.text: "Нет, но я предполагаю, что знаю более осведомленную персону. И, когда мы наконец заговорим о деле, из-за которого я призвал Вашу Светлость, я назову его имя".
"No, but I believe I know someone who is better informed. And I will name that person as soon as we finally start discussing the matter that prompted me to summon Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."
languages.original_text: "Нет, но я предполагаю, что знаю более осведомленную персону. И, когда мы наконец заговорим о деле, из-за которого я призвал Вашу Светлость, я назову его имя".

traits.locale_text: "No, but I believe I know someone who is better informed. And I'll name that person as soon as we finally start discussing the matter which prompted me to summon Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "No, but I believe I know someone who is better informed. And I will name that person as soon as we finally start discussing the matter that prompted me to summon Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: “我没办法，不过我认识某个更加消息灵通的人。等到我们开始讨论这次会面的正事之后，我就会离开说出那个人的名字。”
languages.original_text: "No, but I believe I know someone who is better informed. And I will name that person as soon as we finally start discussing the matter that prompted me to summon Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."

traits.locale_text: “我没办法，不过我认识某个更加消息灵通的人。等到我们开始讨论这次会面的正事之后，我就会离开说出那个人的名字。”
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: 「いや、しかし、もっと情報を持っている者を知っている。その人物の名前は、私が陛下を召喚するきっかけとなった問題をの話し合いがようやく始まりしだい、言うつもりだ。」
languages.original_text: "No, but I believe I know someone who is better informed. And I will name that person as soon as we finally start discussing the matter that prompted me to summon Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."

traits.locale_text: 「いや、しかし、もっと情報を持っている者を知っている。その人物の名前は、私が陛下を召喚するきっかけとなった問題をの話し合いがようやく始まりしだい、言うつもりだ。」
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: «No, pero creo que conozco a alguien que está mejor informado, y nombraré a esa persona tan pronto como finalmente empecemos a hablar sobre el asunto que me llevó a convocar a mi{mf|lord|lady}».
languages.original_text: "No, but I believe I know someone who is better informed. And I will name that person as soon as we finally start discussing the matter that prompted me to summon Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."

traits.locale_text: «No, pero creo que conozco a alguien que está mejor informado, y nombraré a esa persona tan pronto como finalmente empecemos a hablar sobre el asunto que me llevó a convocar a mi{mf|lord|lady}».
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: "Nein, aber ich kenne wohl jemanden, der besser informiert ist. Und ich nenne Euch den Namen dieser Person, sobald wir endlich über die Angelegenheit gesprochen haben, wegen der ich Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} gerufen habe."
languages.original_text: "No, but I believe I know someone who is better informed. And I will name that person as soon as we finally start discussing the matter that prompted me to summon Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."

traits.locale_text: "Nein, aber ich kenne wohl jemanden, der besser informiert ist. Und ich nenne Euch den Namen dieser Person, sobald wir endlich über die Angelegenheit gesprochen haben, wegen der ich Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} gerufen habe."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: « Non, mais je pense connaître quelqu'un qui le pourrait. Je vous donnerai son nom une fois que nous aurons discuté du sujet qui m'a amené à vous convoquer, Votre Seigneurie. »
languages.original_text: "No, but I believe I know someone who is better informed. And I will name that person as soon as we finally start discussing the matter that prompted me to summon Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."

traits.locale_text: « Non, mais je pense connaître quelqu'un qui le pourrait. Je vous donnerai son nom une fois que nous aurons discuté du sujet qui m'a amené à vous convoquer, Votre Seigneurie. »
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: "Hayır ama galiba benden daha bilgili birini tanıyorum. Bu kişinin adını da zatıaliniz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'ni buraya çağırmama sebep olan meseleyi konuştuğumuzda vereceğim."
languages.original_text: "No, but I believe I know someone who is better informed. And I will name that person as soon as we finally start discussing the matter that prompted me to summon Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."
